name: Superhero Substitute
description:
This is a small game I decided to make while taking a break on larger projects. It was originally planned to be for both the Unexpected Jam and GBJam 8, but I missed the deadline for the latter, hence why the game has a Game Boy aesthetic.

There's only one playable character, four levels, and no audio or story for now because I wanted to get something done in time for the Unexpected Jam, but I plan on adding much more before the rating period ends.

Use WASD to move. Press "K" to activate your special ability and "L" to pick up objects and place them down. If you get stuck, press "R" to restart the stage.
